text: @GOP @realDonaldTrump @Mike_Pence Why is coronavirus only/mostly attack the country with a nuclear weapon? Isn’t a artificial one created by ? People gonna die more with stress and depression rather then they exposed. I wish i was a billionaire to get isolated in one place with personal doctor, nurse and food.
